title: 2008 Clube Atlético Juventus season
text: The following is a summary of the campaign of Clube Atlético Juventus in 2008, a <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="S%C3%A3o%20Paulo">São Paulo</a>, <a href="S%C3%A3o%20Paulo%20%28state%29">São Paulo state</a>, <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>. For an overview of the club, see <a href="Clube%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Juventus">Clube Atlético Juventus</a>.
